verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Onward, Christian soldiers, marching as to war, With the cross of Jesus going on before! Christ, the loyal Master, leads against the foe, Forward into battle, see His banners go!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Onward, Christian soldiers, marching as to war, With the cross of Jesus going on before!{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Onward then, ye people, join our happy throng, Blend with ours your voices in the triumph song. Glory, laud, and honor unto Christ the King, This through countless ages men and angels sing.{/lang-eng}
